mapper.update: update user set `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_no = #{uNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `identity` = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `power` = #{power,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u_id, `password`, u_no, user_name, email, phone, sex, address, `identity`, `status`, `power`, creat_time, modify_time from user where u_no = #{uNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select u_id, `password`, u_no, user_name, email, phone, sex, address, `identity`, `status`, `power`, creat_time, modify_time from user where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
